author: Liz Crampton
title: Most Americans on food stamps must shop at stores, risking coronavirus exposure
description: The stay-at-home orders leave low-income people on food stamps especially vulnerable, and millions more are expected to qualify for benefits in a recession.
content:
We feel like its a great option to help ensure social distancing measures, help folks that qualify for our program have different options in grocery store delivery methods, Hardin said. Its a great tool considering the current environment right now.
